short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text using double click on web page and open extension, you will see meaning and other info of the selected word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Word Meaning allows you to instantly find the meaning and additional information about any word by simply double-clicking on it. Once text is selected, open the extension to get the definition and other useful details right in the popup window, enhancing your browsing experience with quick and easy word lookup.
